title: BALCONY LOVERS DREAM! 2BD/2BH W/D, POOL, ROOFDECK & AMAZING AMENITIES

posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 2906127392', 'Rent: $3,235 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: Now, August or September', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Gas', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'FEATURES', 'Courtyard with BBQ Grilling Stations', 'Dishwasher', 'Fireplace lounge with walk-up bar', 'Gaming lounge with four large screens and games', 'Garage Parking', 'Gym', 'Pet Spa', 'Pool', 'Quartz Counter Tops', 'Refrigerator', 'Rock climbing wall', 'Roofdeck with ocean views', 'Rooftop Fitness Center', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Walk in Closets', 'Walk to Blue Line', 'Washer/Dryer In Unit', 'WiFi featured throughout all indoor and outdoor amenities', 'Another Level Realty LLC', 'Call Now', '617 888 6265', 'In Boston walk to Blue Line easy commute to Downtown, State Street, Airport, Aquarium', "IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME.", 'I HAVE THOUSANDS OF OTHER PROPERTIES.', 'All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable, it is represented subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions are approximate.', 'For exact dimensions, please hire your own architect or engineer.']
